update PRM_TASK_B
PK_TASK = #{pk_task,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_ORDER = #{plan_order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECTID = #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECTID_CODE = #{projectid_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECTID_NAME = #{projectid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACT_ORDER = #{fact_order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECT_STATUS = #{project_status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECT_CONTENT = #{project_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JUDGE_STANDARD = #{judge_standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PIC_URL = #{pic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id}

update PRM_TASK_B set PK_TASK = #{pk_task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAN_ORDER = #{plan_order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROJECTID = #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECTID_CODE = #{projectid_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECTID_NAME = #{projectid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACT_ORDER = #{fact_order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROJECT_STATUS = #{project_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROJECT_CONTENT = #{project_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUDGE_STANDARD = #{judge_standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POLLING_VALUE = #{polling_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC_URL = #{pic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_NAME = #{creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from PRM_TASK_B where PK_TASK = #{id} and DR=0

SELECT PLANB.PK_ER_PROJECT PROJECTID, PLANB.ER_PROJECT_CODE PROJECTID_CODE, PLANB.ER_PROJECT_NAME PROJECTID_NAME, PROJECTB.CPRJCONTENT PROJECT_CONTENT, PROJECTB.CJUDSTD JUDGE_STANDARD FROM PRM_PLAN PLAN INNER JOIN PRM_PLAN_B PLANB ON PLAN.ID = PLANB.PK_PLAN INNER JOIN PRM_PROJECT_B PROJECTB ON PLANB.PK_ER_PROJECT = PROJECTB.CPARENTID WHERE PLANB.DR = 0 AND PROJECTB.DR = 0 AND PLAN.ID = #{planid}
